original_title: 右門捕物帖　地獄の風車
overview: Umon’s services are called upon when innocent bystanders, Kayo and Minokichi, along with the ronin, Gontaro are mistakenly identified as suspects in several recent murder cases. To prove their innocence and uncover the truth, Umon launches his own investigation.
title: Case of Umon: Hell’s Windmill
